FuncDef: The display isis frr summary command displays the FRR protection rates of routes in an IS-IS process. The display isis frr summary command displays the FRR protection rates of routes in an IS-IS process.
CLIs: display isis frr summary [ level-1 | level-2 | level-1-2 ] [ <process-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the FRR protection rates of Level-1 routes.
-

Displays the FRR protection rates of Level-2 routes.
-

Displays the FRR protection rates of all levels of routes.
-

Specifies an IS-IS process ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.
